text: There is a narrow bridge ahead of you.  On the ground beside you, there is a wooden staff.
The Balrog is coming...
You run across the bridge.
As you reach the middle of the bridge, the Balrog breaks through the wall and jumps onto the bridge.  You turn to face it.
You pick up the staff.
You take the staff and hit it into the bridge.  The Balrog steps forward and the bridge collapses under it.  As it falls, it grabs you with its whip and pulls you down with it.  You both fall down.
Now at this point if you were a wizard, then you might have a chance, but you're not, so you are dead.
You run away from the Balrog, off the bridge, and out of this place.
Unfortunately due to "Shexit" the world has been destroyed, so you die.
